Motor

Class Sprite

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.geom.RectangularShape
      • java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D
        • java.awt.Rectangle
          • Motor.GameObject
            • Motor.Sprite
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.Shape, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Player

    public abstract class Sprite
extends GameObject
    Created by Juhis5 on 27.11.2015. Sprite is a class inherited from GameObject that holds all the variables needed for a sprite.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public void update()
        Override of the GameObject update method. updates the position of the sprite according to the speed variables when called.
